confirmDialog.title: Confirmation
confirmDialog.message: Are you sure you want to continue?

unsavedChangesDialog.title: Unsaved Changes
unsavedChangesDialog.message: There are unsaved changes, and if you exit they will be lost. Do you want to save the data before exiting?

qgis.configurationNotDefined: QGIS service or project configuration has not been defined

validation.required: This field must be filled in mandatory
validation.requiredWithField: The field "{field}" must be filled in mandatory
validation.invalidType: The entered data type is not valid
validation.invalidTypeWithField: The field "{field}": The entered data type is not valid
validation.greaterThanNow: The date/time must be after the current date/time
validation.greaterThanNowWithField: The field "{field}": The date/time must be after the current date/time
validation.smallerThanNow: The date/time must be before the current date/time
validation.smallerThanNowWithField: The field "{field}": The date/time must be before the current date/time
validation.greaterThanField: The value must be greater than the value of field "{field}"
validation.greaterEqualThanField: The value must be greater than or equal to the value of field "{field}"
validation.smallerThanField: The value must be less than the value of field "{field}"
validation.maxLength: The text cannot have more than {max} characters
validation.maxLengthWithField: The field "{field}": The text cannot have more than {max} characters
validation.dependOn: This field can only have a value when field "{field}" meets the required condition
validation.dni: The entered DNI is not valid
validation.nie: The entered NIE is not valid
validation.cif: The entered CIF is not valid
validation.dniNieCif: The entered document (DNI/NIE/CIF) is not valid
validation.integerType: The value must be an integer number
validation.numberType: The value must be a number
validation.dateType: The value must be a valid date
validation.timeType: The value must be a valid time (HH:mm or HH:mm:ss)
validation.booleanType: The value must be true or false
validation.maxLengthField: The text cannot have more than {length} characters
validation.maxLengthFieldWithField: The field "{field}": The text cannot have more than {length} characters
validation.maxDecimals: The number cannot have more than {precision} decimals
validation.maxDecimalsWithField: The field "{field}": The number cannot have more than {precision} decimals
validation.invalidValue: The entered value is not valid

validationFailed.title: Validation error
validationFailed.message: Please correct the errors in the form before saving

retrievingFeature.title: Error retrieving feature
retrievingFeature.message: Could not retrieve the feature from the server

layerServiceNotAvailable.title: Service error
layerServiceNotAvailable.message: Layer service not available and cannot use direct QGIS parameters

map.errorLoadingLibrary: Leaflet could not be loaded after waiting.
map.wmtsPluginNotAvailable: WMTS plugin not available, using WMS as fallback
map.noFeaturesFound: No features found at this point
map.deleteConfirmMessage: You are about to delete the selected item. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?

bookmarks.title: Map bookmarks
bookmarks.clickToGo: Click to go to this extent

map.deleteSuccessMessage: The record has been successfully deleted
map.deleteErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to delete the feature

error.missingData: Missing data required to display attributes

editHelp.title: Editing help
editHelp.basic2: Finish with double click or clicking less than 3 px from the last vertex.
editHelp.basic3: After finishing you can Save or Cancel. If there are multi layers, you can start another geometry with the next click.
editHelp.vertices2: Click on midpoints to insert vertices; hold to insert and drag in a single gesture.
editHelp.vertices3: To delete a vertex: Alt+click or right click on the vertex (lines ≥ 2, polygons ≥ 3).
editHelp.holes1: Click Add hole and draw the inner ring; finish with double click or close by proximity.
editHelp.holes2: During the hole, the outer contour vertices do not move.
editHelp.holes3: You can remove the last hole with Remove hole.
editHelp.save1: When pressing Save, a dialog will open to fill the attributes associated with the geometry before sending to the server.

incomplete.title: Incomplete geometry
incomplete.message: Draw a valid geometry before saving.

noLayers.title: No configured layers
noLayers.message: There are no configured layers that accept this type of geometry.

noMultiLayers.message: There are no layers that accept multiple geometries for this type.

error.title: Error saving geometry
error.message: The geometry could not be saved.

save.selectLayerMessage: Select the layer where you want to save the newly drawn geometry.
